Mechanics.Name: Prototype Laser Alpha
Mechanics.Description: Four circle AoEs will appear from the center and move toward the outside of the arena

Mechanics.Name: Prototype Laser Beta
Mechanics.Description: Circle AoEs will be placed on every player, requiring them to spread out

Mechanics.Name: Grand Sword
Mechanics.Description: A cone AoE targeting a random player

Phases.Strategy: There is an electrical field on the outside of the arena, giving people the debuff Electrocution that deals damage over time

Mechanics.Name: Spine Shatter
Mechanics.Description: Large damage on the primary target

Mechanics.Name: Iron Uprising
Mechanics.Description: A frontal cone AoE that knocks players back

Mechanics.Name: Activate
Mechanics.Description: Summons a Magitek Death Claw that tethers to one player and slowly moves towards them, knocking player back when it gets to them

Mechanics.Name: Augmented Shatter
Mechanics.Description: A stack on a random player, followed by Wheel of Suffering

Mechanics.Name: Wheel of Suffering
Mechanics.Description: A circle AoE that deals damage to all players near the boss

Mechanics.Name: Augmented Uprising
Mechanics.Description: Hops to one side of the arena and casts a cone AoE that

Mechanics.Name: Augmented Suffering
Mechanics.Description: Jumps to the center and cast a knockback attack

Phases.Strategy: At 5%% HP, Gaius will summon 4 Phantom Gaius adds that must be taken out while he charges up Blade Energy for his ultimate attack "Veni Vidi Vici", which will instantly kill the party if energy reaches 100%

Mechanics.Name: Innocence
Mechanics.Description: Large damage on the primary target

Mechanics.Name: Terminus Est
Mechanics.Description: Fires flaming Xs, which will spawn a line AoE infront of them after a few seconds

Mechanics.Name: Phantasmata
Mechanics.Description: Clones of Gaius will appear on the long side of the arena and each will cast Terminus Est

Mechanics.Name: Festina Lente
Mechanics.Description: Stack marker on a random player

Mechanics.Name: Ductus
Mechanics.Description: Three circular AoEs appear on the short side of the arena and move along the length of the platform

Mechanics.Name: Hand of the Empire
Mechanics.Description: Each player will be marked by an unavoidable circle AoE

Mechanics.Name: Heirsbane (Phantom)
Mechanics.Description: Targets a random player, dealing damage to them
